name: Package Panic!
description:
You're the only worker at your shipping facility! Work as hard as you can to load up your three trucks with as many items as you can. You don't want to disappoint your customers! They sure do have some weird things they want shipped...

Try to load as many items as possible without running out of space on your trucks. Loading larger items will give you a higher score.

• Use [W] [A] [S] [D] to move around

• Use the mouse to look around.

• Use the left mouse button to pick up and interact with objects.

• Hold the right mouse button while holding an object to rotate it.

• Scroll the mouse wheel while holding an object to move it closer or further from you.

When you are finished packing the trucks, open the gates in the parking lot to allow the trucks to deliver the shipments!

Created in Unreal Engine for the 2021 Epic MegaJam.
